full_summary:
### Ontario and Great Lakes Farm Input Price Survey
#### Call for a Request for Proposal

# Call for a Request for Proposal (RFP)

The **Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada** department is seeking a Data Analysis and Survey Performance Service to gather current data on farm input prices in Ontario and the Great Lakes region.

## Request Details

*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012519
*   **Solicitation Number**: 01B68-22-0063
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-11-04
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-15T12:00:00

## Key Performance Indicators and Expected Timeline

This tender aims to collect up-to-date data on farm input prices that can be used for analyzing market developments and informing decision-makers. The expected contract duration is approximately 4 years, with contract award date being the starting point and March 31, 2026, being the expected end date.

## Contract Information and Requirements

The department is seeking a data analyst to perform the following tasks:

*   Collect current farm input prices in Ontario and the Great Lakes region
*   Analyze data for market trends
*   Create reports on the findings

## Skills and Experience Requirements

Applicants are expected to have expertise in data analysis and survey methodology. Experience with the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada database is an asset.

## Submission and Evaluation of Proposals

Bidders should submit their proposals electronically in accordance with the NAFTA Agreement and GSG. Proposals will be evaluated on qualifications and technical approach. Only successful candidates will be contacted for further discussions.

For more information, view the tender package [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/d8bed12e5dbf291717b054df5630d0cb/22-0063_ont._price_survey_rfp_-_e.pdf). To learn how to download tender documents, please [click this link ](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notices/download-tender-documents). Do not hesitate to contact the Communications Officer if you have any questions. She can be reached at  workspace-produits cansitaldainra2.Elcedao Lagysterantiya tfountainsve intarris*r.\!.
